channel.title: Camera Zoom
channel.description: Does anyone know how to make a zoom in/out feature for a client or have any idea how it worked? I'm working with some stuff and it would be really helpful for me to be able to zoom out.

item.description:

if(i == 1004) eac -= 15; if(i == 1005 ) eac += 15;]

hint it goes in handleMenuKeyDown, and the other hint is key, and cameraHeight
taken from old 201 client

wont work with your client you have to fix 2 simple things, the hints ive givin are for demonik client, not sure is rscd is the same in var names

item.title: Camera Zoom

item.description:

wlayzer:

camtasia 5.0 make record then in there edit and zoom pannel

roflmao[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 18, 2008, 03:22:21 AM[/size][hr][quote=“alexdevinson, post:3, topic:213392”]No, I’m talking about in the actual client. I don’t need butons or anything - I just need to find the variable that controls the game camera’s “view.” My guess is it’s something in Camera.java, but I’ve gone and mucked with various values, and nothing so far.[/quote]

Curious why?
